text:
@Yamiche @milenaac @jeffmason1 I was waiting for the a member of the media to corner Kayleigh McEnany about her ridiculous statement saying that the coronavirus would never come here.

She's a hack. A fraud. Her only "qualifications" are that she lies with such incredible ease and worships Trump like a deity. https://t.co/u6gEsvgoMx
